title: Some few and short considerations on the present distempers; by J.P.
author: Price, John, Citizen of London.
notes: Annotation on Thomason copy: E108[28]: "Dr. Price: J.P."; "July 30th 1642". Annotation on Thomason copy E.240[47]: "Ex Dono Authoris"; "Octob: 28 1642".
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
